EmailTemplate.name: OSS_Webinar_10AM Building a secure Polymer app with Spring backend.Confirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: Webinar Confirmation: Building a secure Polymer app with Spring backend
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=There}}, Your registration is confirmed for the webinar Building a secure Polymer app with Spring backend with Scott Deeg. We are looking forward to having you join us.
To help maximize your webinar experience we recommend that you join a test meeting before the session to check your system and browser compatibility at http://www.webex.com/test-meeting.html <http://www.webex.com/test-meeting.html>. Event Details: Date: Tuesday, March 24, 2015 {{my.My Token:default=Save the Date}}
North America: 10:00am PDT (San Francisco, GMT-07:00) <https://pivotal-io.webex.com/pivotal-io/onstage/g.php?MTID=e2040209d0ea0f52193eefe2dfe8816c8>Join the WebEx <https://pivotal-io.webex.com/pivotal-io/onstage/g.php?MTID=eb140797c9e702d519ac51e114c2d44cc>
Dial In: US TOLL FREE+1-855-749-4750 US TOLL+1-415-655-0001 Show toll-free dialing restrictions <http://www.webex.com/pdf/tollfree_restrictions.pdf>
Access code: 661 167 312
Thank you,
